p: The average programmatic cost of distributing an HIVST kit to a PWLHIV in scenario 1 was estimated to be $13.96 ( Table 1).The cost of providing facility-based HIV testing and counseling to male partners who link to the clinic was $11.89 and $10.55, for men testing HIV-positive and HIV-negative, respectively ( Table 2). Male linkage costs increased to $20.02 and $18.68, for men testing HIV-negative and HIV-positive, respectively, if an $8.13 travel reimbursement was given to males who linked to clinic testing, as done in the Obumu intervention. Overall, personnel comprised the largest proportion of the cost (73.4%), followed by HIVST kits (15.5%) ( Figure 1).
